donor_name: JOINT UNITED NATIONS PROGRAMME ON HIV/AIDS
outputs.output_descr:
1.National processes for policy formulation and implementation established
2.MTP implementation monitored and reported
3.National MDG progress monitored and reported 
4.National MDG Accelerated Action Plan produced and implemented
5.Increased national capacity, awareness and commitment to the MDGs
6.Increased local capacity for MDG-based planning and programme implementation

project_descr: Supporting national efforts to implement the Medium Term Plan and accelerate achievement on the MDGs in Zimbabwe
project_title: Accelerating MDG attainment and MTP implementation
